results.title: Differential effects of simvastatin and pravastatin on expression of Alzheimer's disease-related genes in human astrocytes and neuronal cells.

results.title: Effects of statins on alpha7 nicotinic receptor, cholinesterase and alpha-form of secreted amyloid precursor peptide in SH-SY5Y cells.
results.text_hl: In order to reveal the neuroprotective effects of statins that could be of interest for the prevention and treatment of @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@), we investigated the expression of nicotinic acetylcholine receptors (nAChRs) detected by RT-PCR, the activity of @GENE_ACHE @GENE_43 @@@acetylcholinesterase@@@ (@GENE_ACHE @GENE_43 @@@AChE@@@) and @GENE_BCHE @GENE_590 @@@butyrylcholinesterase@@@ (@GENE_BCHE @GENE_590 @@@BuChE@@@) by colorimetric determination, and the levels of the alpha-form of secreted beta-amyloid precursor protein (alphaAPPs) by Western blotting in @<m>DISEASE_Neuroblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009447 @@@neuroblastoma@@@ (@CELLLINE_CVCL:0019 @@@SH-SY5Y@@@) cells exposed to @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, respectively.

citations.NLM: Roensch J, Crisby M, Nordberg A, Xiao Y, Zhang LJ, Guan ZZ. Effects of statins on alpha7 nicotinic receptor, cholinesterase and alpha-form of secreted amyloid precursor peptide in SH-SY5Y cells. Neurochem Int. 2007 May;50(6):800-6. PMID: 17412455

results.title: Mevalonate Cascade Inhibition by Simvastatin Induces the Intrinsic Apoptosis Pathway via Depletion of Isoprenoids in Tumor Cells
results.text_hl: Interestingly, our current investigation suggests that @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ depletion is not involved in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced apoptosis in @DISEASE_Glioblastoma @DISEASE_MESH:D005909 @@@glioblastoma@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Neuroblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009447 @@@neuroblastoma@@@, @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@non-small lung cancer@@@ cells, and @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ cell lines.

results.title: Modulation of Statin-Activated Shedding of Alzheimer APP Ectodomain by ROCK
results.text_hl: We found that both @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ stimulated sAPPalpha shedding from a @<m>DISEASE_Neuroblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009447 @@@neuroblastoma@@@ cell line via a subcellular mechanism apparently located upstream of endocytosis.
